Haven is magnifcent. Its so peaceful and the flora has the same vivid colors as the ones in Lelyetia, though they grow towards light. Again, the crystals in the soil must have something to do with the vividness and coloration of the leaves.

The creatures here are so friendly and amicable. Halycon milk is kinda tasty. I'm no engineer, I have no clue how to get myself off this planet, but why would I. I like it here. I've no wish to leave.
